DataElement.preferredName: Past Year Menses Long Absent Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether or not a woman's menstrual periods ever came very far apart or not at all over the past year. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Year Menses Long Absent Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Periodic discharge of blood and tissue from the uterus.  Until menopause, menstruation occurs approximately every 28 days when a woman is not pregnant._The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set._Of relatively great or greater than average spatial extension or temporal duration._Not existing in a specified place at a specified time._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Periodic discharge of blood and tissue from the uterus.  Until menopause, menstruation occurs approximately every 28 days when a woman is not pregnant.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
The normal physiologic discharge through the vagina of blood and mucosal tissues from the nonpregnant uterus.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of relatively great or greater than average spatial extension or temporal duration.:Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Of relatively great or greater than average spatial extension or temporal duration.
Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
